rajaye widhayaka shreniye niladharinta suwisheshi waraprasadayak washayen thiru badu sahana yatathe motar ratha genwimata laba dena balapathraya saha emangin genwu wahana dewani parshwayakata wikinime jawaramak siduwemin pawathina bawa heli wi thibe.mema balapathraya miladi ganima sandaha maha parimana wahana aanayanakaruwan wisin wenama brokarwarun pawa yodawa thibe.mema balapathrayak rupiyal laksha 7 sita 10 dakwa wu mila gananwalata alewi karana bawa heliwa thibe.motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa saha reguwa haraha kala soya balim waladi da heliwuye balapathraya laba ganime sudusukam lath niladharin wadi pirisak eya wikunana bawayi.wahanayak meratata genwimedi regu gasthu haraha rajayata wishala aadayamak labeyi.ema aadayama pasekala rajaya rajya niladharinta ema suwisheshi waraprasadaya laba denne rajya niladharinge thanathurata karana gaurawayak washayen bawa mudal amathyanshaya pawasayi.mudal amathyanshaya ema balapathraya laba deyi.
